dataMapping.title: Strategic Media Planning Roadmap
dataMapping.subtitle: Comprehensive campaign implementation and optimization timeline
dataMapping.overallObjective: Strategic campaign objective (e.g., 'Launch integrated media campaign with 25% brand awareness lift')

phases.primaryLabel: Strategic phase (e.g., 'Planning & Setup', 'Launch Phase', 'Optimization Phase', 'Scale & Expansion')
phases.description: Phase strategic objectives and key activities
phases.budget: Phase budget allocation (e.g., '$1.2M', '30% of total budget')

successCriteria: Success criteria (e.g., 'All channels activated', 'Performance within 10% of target')

dependencies: Strategic dependencies (e.g., 'Budget approval received', 'Creative assets approved')

successMetrics: Strategic success metrics (e.g., '25% brand awareness lift', '4.5x ROAS', '85% reach of target audience')
